text: Afi kramo'ene sipisipi anentamokea magopi mani'neke trazana nenesakeno, laionimo'ene bulimakao afumo'enena magopi mani'neke hagege trazana negaha'e. Hianagi osifavemo'a kugusopa negahie. Ana hu'neanki'za Nagri ruotage agonafina havi avu'ava zana nosnageno, magomofoma azeri havizama hu'zana omanegahie. Ra Anumzamo'na amana nanekea nehue.
